items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Carlos Undetectable PSA (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: The Carlos public service announcement (PSA) is a 30-second video that features Carlos talking about living with HIV and what being undetectable means to him. The purpose of the video is to share emphasis on the knowledge that people with HIV (PWH) who take HIV medicine as prescribed and achieve and maintain an undetectable viral load have effectively no risk of transmitting HIV through sex.

items.Title: Prescribe HIV Prevention — Taking PrEP: A Daily Pill to Reduce Your Risk of Getting HIV (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This booklet provides your patients with detailed information about how PrEP prevents HIV infection, including regimen, side effects, safety, health insurance coverage, and available resources.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This booklet provides your patients with detailed information about how PrEP prevents HIV infection, including regimen, side effects, safety, health insurance coverage, and available resources.

items.Title: Prescribe HIV Prevention — Discussing Sexual Health With Your Patients (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This sexual history tool guides sexual health conversations with your patients, allowing you to better understand a patient’s level of risk, determine whether you need to recommend screenings or vaccinations, and offer appropriate counseling.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This sexual history tool guides sexual health conversations with your patients, allowing you to better understand a patient’s level of risk, determine whether you need to recommend screenings or vaccinations, and offer appropriate counseling.

items.Title: Prescribe HIV Prevention — Now’s The Time To Find Out About PrEP/PEP (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This pocket brochure provides information about both PrEP and PEP and provides patients with useful tips on what to ask their health care provider.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This pocket brochure provides information about both PrEP and PEP and provides patients with useful tips on what to ask their health care provider.

items.Title: Prescribe HIV Prevention — Share the Night, Not HIV (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This poster can be displayed in waiting areas and exam rooms to increase patient awareness about PrEP.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — Due Date Projection Wheel (Graphic)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This due date projection wheel is a tool commonly used among obstetricians and midwives. This version highlights the ideal time to test a pregnant woman for HIV and reminds that it is never too late to test for HIV.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — Understanding Your HIV Test Results (Fact Sheet)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This fact sheet helps pregnant patients understand their HIV test results. The fact sheet is double-sided with English on one side and Spanish on the other. Available for download in both regular and print-ready formats.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This fact sheet helps pregnant patients understand their HIV test results. The fact sheet is double-sided with English on one side and Spanish on the other. Available for download in both regular and print-ready formats.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — Helpful Tests for You and Your Baby (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This handout provides pregnant women with a list and description of recommended tests all pregnant women should have, including the HIV test.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This handout provides pregnant women with a list and description of recommended tests all pregnant women should have, including the HIV test.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — Even If a Mother Has HIV, Her Baby Doesn't Have To (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This poster encourages all pregnant patients to get an HIV test. The poster is double-sided, with English on one side and Spanish on the other.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This poster encourages all pregnant patients to get an HIV test. The poster is double-sided, with English on one side and Spanish on the other.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — When Pregnant Patients are Unsure about HIV Screening (Fact Sheet)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This obstetric provider fact sheet gives obstetric providers recommendations and strategies to employ when pregnant patients are reluctant to participate in HIV screening.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This obstetric provider fact sheet gives obstetric providers recommendations and strategies to employ when pregnant patients are reluctant to participate in HIV screening.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — HIV Testing for Pregnant Women and Newborns (Fact Sheet)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This fact sheet provides key information about antigen/antibody HIV tests and summarizes CDC’s new testing algorithm.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This fact sheet provides key information about antigen/antibody HIV tests and summarizes CDC’s new testing algorithm.

items.Title: One Test. Two Lives. — Even If a Mother Has HIV, Her Baby Doesn't Have To (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This patient brochure is an easy-to-read, brief patient education material about HIV and the benefits of prenatal HIV testing.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This patient brochure is an easy-to-read, brief patient education material about HIV and the benefits of prenatal HIV testing.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Yuri's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Yuri talks about how, with HIV treatment, he’s not letting HIV stop him from doing the activities he loves.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Yuri talks about how, with HIV treatment, he’s not letting HIV stop him from doing the activities he loves.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Tommy's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Tommy talks about living with HIV in the Deep South and the importance of getting tested, getting in care, and staying in care.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Tommy talks about living with HIV in the Deep South and the importance of getting tested, getting in care, and staying in care.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Sharon's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Sharon talks about how she overcame her fears when she was first diagnosed with HIV, and now she is a public speaker for HIV awareness.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Sharon talks about how she overcame her fears when she was first diagnosed with HIV, and now she is a public speaker for HIV awareness.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Sharmain's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Sharmain talks about how being in medical care and staying on HIV treatment means her baby has a 99% chance of being born HIV-free.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Sharmain talks about how being in medical care and staying on HIV treatment means her baby has a 99% chance of being born HIV-free.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Ryan's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Ryan talks about seeing the benefits of HIV medication and how taking his medications has become part of his daily routine.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Ryan talks about seeing the benefits of HIV medication and how taking his medications has become part of his daily routine.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Quoc's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Quoc talks about how getting clean and getting on HIV treatment has led him to help others get in care, stay on treatment, and learn to live a long, healthy life.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Quoc talks about how getting clean and getting on HIV treatment has led him to help others get in care, stay on treatment, and learn to live a long, healthy life.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — PSA (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) HIV Treatment Works national communication campaign for people living with HIV features the stories of individuals living with HIV talking about how sticking to treatment helps them stay healthy, protect others, do what they love, and live a longer, healthier life.
items.Iconic Image_alt: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) HIV Treatment Works national communication campaign for people living with HIV features the stories of individuals living with HIV talking about how sticking to treatment helps them stay healthy, protect others, do what they love, and live a longer, healthier life.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Malina's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Malina talks about how she manages her HIV so that she can devote all her time and energy to her son.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Malina talks about how she manages her HIV so that she can devote all her time and energy to her son.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Jennifer's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Jennifer talks about how as a transgender woman, it was hard to find a doctor who understood her HIV treatment needs; but she kept looking until she found someone.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Jennifer talks about how as a transgender woman, it was hard to find a doctor who understood her HIV treatment needs; but she kept looking until she found someone.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Christopher's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Christopher talks about how getting an HIV test saved his life and he’s now helping youth learn about HIV prevention, testing and fighting stigma.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Christopher talks about how getting an HIV test saved his life and he’s now helping youth learn about HIV prevention, testing and fighting stigma.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Chris' Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Chris talks about his fears of rejection when he was first diagnosed with HIV, and how his grandmother helps him live well with HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Chris talks about his fears of rejection when he was first diagnosed with HIV, and how his grandmother helps him live well with HIV.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Cedric's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Cedric talks about his battle with HIV, and how he overcame his fears to get on treatment. Staying on treatment lets him to live his life.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Cedric talks about his battle with HIV, and how he overcame his fears to get on treatment. Staying on treatment lets him to live his life.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Angie's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Angie talks about living with HIV for nearly 20 years, and with treatment she’s continuing to live her life just as she was before HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Angie talks about living with HIV for nearly 20 years, and with treatment she’s continuing to live her life just as she was before HIV.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Aaron's Story (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Introducing Aaron, who talks about how he and his partner Phil are doing everything they can to stay healthy and keep Phil HIV-negative.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Introducing Aaron, who talks about how he and his partner Phil are doing everything they can to stay healthy and keep Phil HIV-negative.

items.Title: HIV Screening. Standard Care. — HIV Testing (Patient Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This brochure for patients provides information on who is at risk for HIV, the importance of HIV testing, details about the HIV test, directions for finding testing sites and a glossary of common terms.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This brochure for patients provides information on who is at risk for HIV, the importance of HIV testing, details about the HIV test, directions for finding testing sites and a glossary of common terms.

items.Title: HIV Screening. Standard Care. — HIV Testing (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This poster highlights the importance of HIV screening for everyone. It is for patient waiting areas and/or exam rooms.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This poster highlights the importance of HIV screening for everyone. It is for patient waiting areas and/or exam rooms.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Changing The Conversation (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis) is an HIV prevention pill. When taken daily, it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis) is an HIV prevention pill. When taken daily, it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — You Feel It (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: HIV stigma hurts the well-being and mental health of people living with HIV, and even prevents some from getting medical treatment.
items.Iconic Image_alt: HIV stigma hurts the well-being and mental health of people living with HIV, and even prevents some from getting medical treatment.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Who Inspires Me (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: He always sees the best in others and expects the same in return. He’s living proof that HIV doesn’t define a person.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Poster of a Latina woman and her brother, who is living with HIV. The poster reads, "Who inspires me? My brother." The poster addresses stigma that affects people with HIV.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — People Need People (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Living with HIV can be isolating. But with the support of people who love me and don’t judge me by my HIV status, I’m living a full and healthy life.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Poster of an African American woman who is living with HIV. The poster reads, "People need people." The poster addresses stigma that affects people with HIV.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Park Friends (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Life with HIV can have its challenges. But with the support of family and friends, we are able to thrive and live healthy lives.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Life with HIV can have its challenges. But with the support of family and friends, we are able to thrive and live healthy lives.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — My Friend (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: When we support people living with HIV, we make it easier for them to live healthy lives.
items.Iconic Image_alt: When we support people living with HIV, we make it easier for them to live healthy lives.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Karl Schmid (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I shared my story about living with HIV on social media. The outpouring of support has been amazing.
items.Iconic Image_alt: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I shared my story about living with HIV on social media. The outpouring of support has been amazing.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Life Together (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: It doesn’t matter that he’s positive and I’m not. What matters is that we love and support each other.
items.Iconic Image_alt: It doesn’t matter that he’s positive and I’m not. What matters is that we love and support each other.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Just A Virus (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Stigma hurts the well-being and mental health of people living with HIV, and even prevents some from getting medical treatment.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Stigma hurts the well-being and mental health of people living with HIV, and even prevents some from getting medical treatment.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Friends Hiking (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: HIV does not define our friendships. When we support those living with HIV, we make it easier for them to live healthy lives.
items.Iconic Image_alt: HIV does not define our friendships. When we support those living with HIV, we make it easier for them to live healthy lives.

items.Title: Stop HIV Stigma — Family (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: HIV does not define our family. It is our faith and the love we share that makes us who we are.
items.Iconic Image_alt: HIV does not define our family. It is our faith and the love we share that makes us who we are.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Yuri (Palm Card)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Palm card featuring Yuri, a gay Latino man living with HIV. On the front Yuri is clapping his hands, and on the back he is exercising.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Palm card featuring Yuri, a gay Latino man living with HIV. On the front Yuri is clapping his hands, and on the back he is exercising.

items.Link Descriptor Text: Palm card featuring Whitney, an African American transgender woman living with HIV. On the front is a picture of Whitney smiling at the camera while lifting a dumbbell. On the back is a picture of Whitney lifting the dumbbell above her head.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Palm card featuring Whitney, an African American transgender woman living with HIV. On the front is a picture of Whitney smiling at the camera while lifting a dumbbell. On the back is a picture of Whitney lifting the dumbbell above her head.

items.Iconic Image_alt: Palm card featuring Tommy, an African American gay man living with HIV. On the front he is looking at his watch, and on the back he is looking at a shirt on a hanger.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Sharon (Palm Card)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Palm card featuring Sharon, a Native American woman living with HIV. On the front and back of the palm card are the same photo of Sharon sitting in front of a window.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Palm card featuring Sharon, a Native American woman living with HIV. On the front and back of the palm card are the same photo of Sharon sitting in front of a window.

items.Title: HIV Treatment Works — Sharmain (Palm Card)

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Undetectable (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Undetectable means reaching a point where the amount of HIV in your blood is so low it can’t be measured. It is important for your health and it makes it very unlikely to pass HIV to a partner.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men having a conversation about HIV prevention as they walk.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Undetectable (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Undetectable means reaching a point where the amount of HIV in your blood is so low it can’t be measured. It is important for your health and it makes it very unlikely to pass HIV to a partner.
items.Iconic Image_alt: A group of gay/bisexual men

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Testing (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Knowing your HIV status helps you choose options to stay healthy. HIV testing is free, fast, and confidential.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men having a conversation about HIV prevention as they walk.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Testing (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Knowing your HIV status helps you choose options to stay healthy. HIV testing is free, fast, and confidential.
items.Iconic Image_alt: A group of gay/bisexual men sitting on steps having a conversation about HIV prevention.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Testing (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Knowing your HIV status helps you choose options to stay healthy. HIV testing is free, fast, and confidential.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men having a conversation about HIV prevention.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk PrEP (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: PrEP is an HIV prevention option. When taken daily it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV. You can protect yourself even more if you use condoms and other prevention tools.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men aving a conversation about HIV prevention while they walk.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk PrEP (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: PrEP is an HIV prevention option. When taken daily it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV. You can protect yourself even more if you use condoms and other prevention tools.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men aving a conversation about HIV prevention.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Condoms (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more HIV prevention options than ever before, and condoms are still a highly effective option to prevent both HIV and other STDs.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Two gay/bisexual men having a conversation about HIV prevention.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk PrEP (Poster)

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Talk Condoms (Poster)

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV. — Join the Conversation (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: The conversation about HIV is changing. There are more HIV prevention options than ever before. Start talking about testing, your status, condoms, PrEP, and medicines that treat HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: A gay/bisexual man having a text conversation about HIV prevention.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — What is PrEP? (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Protect yourself. Learn about PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis) and how it works in this short video.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Protect yourself. Learn about PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis) and how it works in this short video.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Pre-exposure Prophylaxis [PrEP] (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Pre-exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) is an HIV prevention option.  When taken daily it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Pre-exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) is an HIV prevention option.  When taken daily it can greatly reduce your risk of getting HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Medicines that treat HIV (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Starting and staying on medicines that treat HIV will help you to be undetectable. Undetectable means reaching a point where the amount of HIV in your blood is so low it can’t be measured.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Starting and staying on medicines that treat HIV will help you to be undetectable. Undetectable means reaching a point where the amount of HIV in your blood is so low it can’t be measured.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Looking Out for Each Other (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Conversation (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV. Join the conversation about HIV testing, your status, condoms, PrEP and medicines that treat HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV. Join the conversation about HIV testing, your status, condoms, PrEP and medicines that treat HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Condoms (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more HIV prevention options than ever before, and condoms are still a highly effective option to prevent both HIV and other STDs.
items.Iconic Image_alt: There are more HIV prevention options than ever before, and condoms are still a highly effective option to prevent both HIV and other STDs.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Choices (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Behind the Scenes (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: View exclusive behind-the-scenes footage of the Start Talking. Stop HIV. campaign featuring gay, bisexual and other men who have sex with men.
items.Iconic Image_alt: View exclusive behind-the-scenes footage of the Start Talking. Stop HIV. campaign featuring gay, bisexual and other men who have sex with men.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Ask Questions (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: There are more options than ever before to prevent HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Music Video featuring Alex Newell: Behind the Scenes
items.Link Descriptor Text: Alex Newell talks about HIV prevention in this behind the scenes footage of the Start Talking. Stop HIV. music video.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Alex Newell talks about HIV prevention in this behind the scenes footage of the Start Talking. Stop HIV. music video.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Music Video featuring Alex Newell
items.Link Descriptor Text: Music video of the song Collect My Love by The Knocks, featuring Alex Newell and gay couples exploring the variety of HIV prevention options available.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Music video of the song Collect My Love by The Knocks, featuring Alex Newell and gay couples exploring the variety of HIV prevention options available.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Never Stop (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Never stop talking about ways to protect yourself and your partner from HIV.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Never stop talking about ways to protect yourself and your partner from HIV.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — Steamy Chat (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: No matter what your HIV status is, talk can still be the perfect foreplay.
items.Iconic Image_alt: No matter what your HIV status is, talk can still be the perfect foreplay.

items.Title: Start Talking. Stop HIV — PrEP: An HIV Prevention Option (Video)
items.Link Descriptor Text: Protect yourself, learn about PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis), how it works, how to get it, and if it’s the right choice for you.
items.Iconic Image_alt: Protect yourself, learn about PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis), how it works, how to get it, and if it’s the right choice for you.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Small Talks About: Regular, Ongoing Care (Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This brochure for medical providers presents recent scientific information on assisting patients remain in HIV care.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This brochure for medical providers presents recent scientific information on assisting patients remain in HIV care.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Let's Talk About: Partner Services (Patient Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This brochure offers patient education on Partner Notification Services provided by the health department.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This brochure offers patient education on Partner Notification Services provided by the health department.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Small Talks About: Partner Services (Provider Brochure)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This provider brochure contains information on the importance of Partner Notification Service and how the process works for them and their patient.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This provider brochure contains information on the importance of Partner Notification Service and how the process works for them and their patient.

items.Link Descriptor Text: This brochure for medical providers presents recent scientific information on assisting patients with ART adherence.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This brochure for medical providers presents recent scientific information on assisting patients with ART adherence.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Let's Talk About: Sticking with your Treatment Plan (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This poster is designed to reinforce with patients the importance of ART adherence and remaining in HIV care. This 11″ x 17″ poster is designed for placement in the exam/waiting room.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This poster is designed to reinforce with patients the importance of ART adherence and remaining in HIV care. This 11″ x 17″ poster is designed for placement in the exam/waiting room.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Serodiscordant Couples (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: The Serodiscordant Couples poster was designed to prompt patients to engage their providers in further discussions about these issues during office visits.
items.Iconic Image_alt: The Serodiscordant Couples poster was designed to prompt patients to engage their providers in further discussions about these issues during office visits.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Let's Talk About: Safer Sex (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This poster is designed to convey to patients the importance of safer sex and some of the options available to help protect their health and partners from HIV infection. This 11”x17” poster is designed for placement in the exam/waiting room.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This poster is designed to convey to patients the importance of safer sex and some of the options available to help protect their health and partners from HIV infection. This 11”x17” poster is designed for placement in the exam/waiting room.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Living with HIV (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: The Living with HIV poster was designed to provide patients with information and prompt them to engage their providers in further discussions about these issues during office visits.
items.Iconic Image_alt: The Living with HIV poster was designed to provide patients with information and prompt them to engage their providers in further discussions about these issues during office visits.

items.Title: Prevention IS Care — Partner Services Referral (Poster)
items.Link Descriptor Text: This mini poster offers a place to keep local health department contact information so providers can make referrals or help patients get in touch with their Partner Notification Services representative.
items.Iconic Image_alt: This mini poster offers a place to keep local health department contact information so providers can make referrals or help patients get in touch with their Partner Notification Services representative.
